content.detailedDescription:
Looked out the window towards the nw and witnessed multi coloured flying object at night, i the hurried to the back sliding door, went ourside to witness multiple white orbs all flashing intermittently high up in the sky from lake ont to lake erie. at that point i then noticed another multi colored flashing air craft flying low from the south to north over my house toward london on are. the craft then produced a very large , bigger than the sun in summer, a white light downwards seemingly at my direction. the light was longer than a flsh approx.5 sec. i then want back inside from the fidget temperatures to the kitchen window where the air craft flew towards the woodstock/london nw. after a few minutes and for an hour or so there were multiple flashing white lights over the lake erie and lake ont areas. crafts were approx. 20
klms away and 5000 ft high or less. also visit cayugaparade.Ca i run the santa parade and one of last years photos with polar express shooting out confettii has a blue large orb and a swiching downwars blue light behind it and a disk shaped craft with lights around it high in the forground.
content.summary: 2 with multi coloured blinking lights and 5 or more with white intense flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, lise, and i were traveling east by auto on route 131, directly behind the alcoa plant and parallel to the st. lawrence seaway shipping canal.  the day was a high pressure day, no clouds, no aircraft were sighted and the temperature was about 60 degrees f. the sun was at the west horizon, and just barely below it. 

i observed a solid looking reddish-orange sphere flying above and along power lines that lead directly into alcoa.  they originate an the robert moses power dam that lies east northeast of alcoa by about 5 1/2 mile.

i immediately noticed that the object did not have any lights on it as required for aircraft navigation. upon making this observation and bringing it to my wife's attention i saw the second sphere following the first on the same flight path.

i was nearing a section of the highway that didn't allow any further observation.   we continued easterly on route 131 for approximately 200 yards when lise and i observed a sphere, i assumed it was the first one, cross route 131 at right angles to the road and at an elevation of approximately 600 feet.  the sphere was larger in diameter due, i assume, to our closer proximity to it. i quickly lost sight of the sphere as trees on the north side of the road blocked our view. 

i had reached the turn to the south for the dennison road and took the turn and stopped. lise and i immediately saw the second sphere leaving the proximity of the power lines at a right angle and it seemed to follow the same northerly flight path of the first sphere.  again, due to trees we lost sight of the object.

i brought the vehicle back on route 131, traveling east and sped up to allow us a better view to the north.  when we reached an overgrown meadow with shorter trees we saw the first sighted object in a stationary position over the seaway shipping canal.  as the second object neared the position of the first sphere, the hovering sphere moved off to the north very quickly. the flight path was not a perfectly straight line but could be characterized by a slight porpoising and the object quickly became smaller to the point that it could no longer be distinguished.

the second sphere,upon reaching the recently vacated position of the first object began hovering, stationary without discernible movement. when the first sighted object was no longer discernible, the second object followed the flight path of the first sighted object until it too was no longer visible.

during our observation our conversations were quite simple like "do you see that?" i expected that, at any time during our observation, something would happen to explain the event, such as aerial navigation lights would be turned on. sitting along side of route 131, with the objects no longer in sight, i asked my wife "what did you see?" as opposed to providing her with my recollections and observations that might taint her viewpoint.  her descriptions were identical to mine.

i continued easterly on route 131 until the eisenhower shipping canal locks were in view and decided to go to the elevated tourist observation
to determine if the lock workers or the general public had the same observations that we had.  two people were at the elevated observation
 location and they stated that they had not seen anything out of the usual.  

we wife and i had cell phone cameras but were too mesmerized by what we were seeing to try taking photos.
content.summary: 2 orange-red orbs, in tandem, appeared over power lines flying east; made abrupt 90 degree turn to north; hovered over shipping canal; proceded north

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were sitting on our house balcony having a cigarette.   i happened to look up in the sky and noticed the ufo.  at first i thought it was an airplane.  the ufo was an oval shaped craft.  the ufo started out as the color red and then changed to green in a very precise manner.  the lights on the ufo never blinked or flashed, the colors just transitioned from red to green like a light switch.  the colors were very bright.  the ufo was hovering with no sound.  it started to move slowly side to side as well as up and down.  the ufo then started to rise higher and higher until it flew off and out of our sight.  the sighting lasted about 5 minutes.  i was very curious and interested to see what the ufo would do next.  i wasn't  scared or frightened.  i was just very curious.  after the sighting i did some research to find other ufo sightings in my area.  i lost sight of the ufo when it flew off and it went out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo was hovering, ufo was oval shaped. ufo changed colors from red to green in a very precise manner. no sound

content.detailedDescription: At approx 0215 hours on 22/02/15 in shrewsbury i was awoke by the sound of a screeching animal. i look outside and i could see a sheep laying on the grass not too.Far from the house. i went down to investigate and saw th st the sheep was dead. it looked like it had been lasered from the jaw down it's side to its rectum area. the wounds were a brown colour and clean cut. there was no blood but there was a strange smell of sulpher in the air. on closer inspection i saw that it's lungs and rectum had been removed surgically. i put my finger  inside and pulled out some strange glue like substance that was a white and yellow colour. it smelt weird and there was approx a cup full of it. i called my friend the farmer who came and collected the dead sheep. he said a few of these things had happened in the area recently and he was scared. i told him that it was definitely aliens and that he should keep a check on this.
content.summary: Female sheep found with strange burn wounds

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were in our back yard about 8:15 pm when she noticed lights in the sky and asked me what it was. at first i thought it was an aircraft but then it stopped and made a rapid decent then quickly back up again. at that time i saw a large white light moving towards it but stop in the sky. 
the craft with the green and red lights flew towards us and came within a quarter mile from us. when it came close to us we could here the engine but unlike any aircraft sound it was more like an electric motor. 
it flew around the area for about 8 minutes. when homes obstructed our view we went to the front of the house to watch it. a neighbor was in his garage and i called him over to see it.
he pulled out his cell phone and recorded it for a few seconds before it decided out of our view. the large white light was still in view in the same spot. 
we got in our car to drive around to see if we could find it again with no luck but when we got back we noticed the white light was gone.
content.summary: 2 rows of red and green lights flying erratically then in my direction then turned away

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened 18 years ago, during a high school summer break. though it's been nearly 20 years, i still remember every detail of that night vividly. it was the strangest thing that has ever happened to me. to either of us.

on july 12 1997, i was spending the weekend with a friend at his home in inglis, florida. we were both at another friends house, to the east, down the same street that my friend lived on. at around 3:00am, we left that friends house to head back to where i was staying after recording some music onto some tapes and me assisting with some computer problems. (this detail will become important later) after walking approximately 10 minutes, we were within a couple of blocks of the friends house i was staying at. as we approached, we noticed a white luminous object that we both first thought was a search helicopter, with a beam shining down to the ground, approximately 3/4 mile away and  to the southeast from where we were walking. we stopped for a moment to take notice as this would not be typical in this rural area, and that we could not hear any noise.

after a moment, we both simultaneously noticed that the craft was not traveling on a path parallel to the ground as a helicopter would, but rather on an elliptical path, getting slightly further away and higher, then closer and lower, etc.. we also took notice to the fact that despite its movement and change in position, we could not see any structure of a helicopter or any other type of known to us craft, only the very bright light of the object itself and it's beam. at that close range, a helicopter would have been immediately recognizable, even in darkness, by its sound, and lights. we began to realize that we might not be looking at a helicopter and were rather confused as to what we were seeing. after watching it's "orbit" for approximately a minute, the beam, as best i can describe it "filtered" up to the craft. a light being switched off would result in the column of light visible being instantly gone, but this light appeared to retract. after the light retracted into the object, it's elliptical orbit stopped and the object itself dimmed considerably, to the point where it was hardly visible. after remaining dark and stationary for approximately 10 seconds, it simultaneously grew in luminosity and apparent size greatly, perhaps 3-4 times, casting light and shadow over a rather large area. it was bright enough that, in the absence of any streetlights, we could momentarily see the yard of the house we were then standing in front of, as if it was early twilight.

it remained stationary for another 15 or so seconds, at its larger size and brightness, before dimming to it's original level when we first noticed it, turning the beam back on (which appeared to filter down to the ground with a total time of around 1 second) and resuming it's elliptical orbit. we were absolutely frozen at this point, awestruck and terrified at the same time, but unable to really say or do much but watch in awe. as terrified as we were, we felt compelled to stay and watch, rather than run the couple of blocks to his house. i don't know why. it did this cycle a further 2 times before going dim and staying stationary for approximately a minute. all the time, we cannot see any discernible shape, or hear any noise. it resumed it's original brightness, and remained stationary for approximately 30 seconds, before taking off on a flight path that took it directly over our heads approximately 150 feet up, at a speed of around 30-40mph. it appeared to be about 20 feet across. as it passed overhead, we looked up, and could tell there was a solid structure that the light was emanating from, but due to the brightness of the light, it was hard to tell what it was, but appeared to be shiny and metallic, with the light coming from the exterior of the craft itself. in other words, there appeared to be no point light source, but rather, the entire craft glowed uniformly. there were no external features that we could discern. in a moment, it was gone over the trees and out of our view. we were quite shaken up over everything that had just happened, and having this craft fly over our heads only a couple hundred feet up, and basically ran for our lives back to his house. we did not sleep the rest of the night. we tried to rationalize what we saw, but no matter what scenarios we came up with, nothing could explain what we saw. we spent the entire next day together, replaying over and over the previous nights events, questioning whether or not we had even seen what we thought. questioning ourselves and our sanity. 

i said earlier that the tapes we had made the previous night would become important, and here is where. later the next night, we were in his room, still shaken up, but calmed down considerably, and decided to pop in one of the tapes we had made the night before. listen to some music, take our minds off of things and relax. we made two tapes full of music, and neither of them were playable. the contents were distorted and mostly un-listenable, in the exact same way if you were to pass the tapes by a large magnet. the tapes were fine when we left as we listened to a part of one of them before leaving where they were recorded. if there was any doubt that what we saw was real, that doubt was now gone. it was real. that realization was terrifying, and for me, left me with anxiety and a feeling of helplessness for quite a long time. even to this day, when i think about it, i get a chill, and recounting this experience right now, i've got tears forming. it was a very powerful experience for me, and i imagine him as well, though after that weekend, we didn't talk much about it.
content.summary: Close encounter with craft in elliptical orbit before going north directly overhead at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: Two lights in the sky as bright as the brightest star, they were stationary then proceeded to move west, but not before dimming briefly. they moved and dimmed at the exact same time. then they just disappeared .
content.summary: Two bright lights

content.detailedDescription: Came home parked in front of my house noticed the sky was beautiful all of the stars were very bright as i was gazing at the night sky i noticed an object or objects moving across the sky at a steady speed i couldn't figure out what i was seeing  i've been in the military stay up on all new aircraft  the only way i can think of to describe this is the pattern of this object or objects was kind of like the wing span of a b-52 but much more  surface not the fusel  lodge just the wing now i cant say for sure that this was one object or 7or8 all i seen was the shape it could have been different objects flying in formation but they moved as one  it was late at night so it was very quiet and i heard no noise coming from this the speed was steady and seemed to be slow but steady can't estimate size or speed only seen object for a very short time tried to follow it but limited view to the north  i really don't know what to say i thought  i've seen everything but this i can't explain  i had no time to get any pictures of this i checked around to see if anyone else reported anything but have found nothing
content.summary: Came home beautiful night sky looked up noticed a boomerang shaped object passing overhead it appeared to be an object with large round  glowing things on bottom or it was seven or eight objects flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: I'm a public servant - gna,  i went outside to take our flag down when i noticed straight above me 4-5 objects that were hovering in a formation at a low altitude. i reached into my pocket for my phone and they were no longer above me, they had moved a great distance west. they weren't in formation any longer and was able to get a short video.
content.summary: 4-5 ufos hovering in a formation straight above me.  removed phone from pocket to video and they moved west very fast. obtained short video

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on a neighborhood road. there was a bright light much brighter than any airplane i've ever seen and white in color. it appeared to be a shooting star or some space related thing. the bright light descended for a little then the bright light shut off and there was just red and blue lights going in a very unsteady flight pattern. the video couldn't capture the ufo after bright light shut off.  no special feelings, just a sense of anxiousness because of what i had observed. i lost sight by turning into an area where trees covered the object and didn't see it again.
content.summary: Bright light going down then steep dive scattered. video

content.detailedDescription: We were trying to take a picture of the bald eagles and after looking at the photos we saw a ufo
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my patio. caught bright blue light flashing as it traveled straight down until out of sight behind mountains.I got out my tablet hoping to see it rise. instead, another one followed exactly what the first one did. 
note: ignore the other lights shown in video. they look odd and flash as well. those are misc lights from the gas station between you and the sky. 
see blue, flashing object traveling straight down. only taped a short part of it. fumbled the camera while amazed looking at it.
note: the area and direction of this video is also where the military comes and goes regularly. obviously a base.
content.summary: Video of 2nd object. 1st was the same. got few seconds on this video.

Ok this thing i got on sensor cam was this time and while ago, just didnt have much proof at time. i checked all dvds for same face on tv and nothing exists on my dvds . this time now this morning i woke up quickly and saw a face same one on my dvd i had fell sleep now morning. each time i had experienced alien activity was when this tv of mine went weird and i was attacked bad very bad cuts in mouth form inside liek they wanted to cut off my mouth and keep it.
i hear things now them not humans only them ..Talking bout how they want the power i think female hormones
now this technology is in my tv would u mufon ppl like to come get it and observe for month or 2 , will sell later date do not want it in my home i dont like it no mroe the pain i go thru the things it does and looks like 
makes me sick

content.detailedDescription: I was at home snow blowing when i got text from my daughter of a ufo takin from our porch,a few seconds later she came around screaming about the ufo and the picture she got before it flew off so fast that she could not stop talking bout it. i had her write down in her own words about what happened and what she saw for you.                                                                                      .................It was february 14,2014. it was a some what cloudy day and i was home with my dad and just snowed so i go with my phone to take a picture and after a few photos i look up and see something in the sky and i was wondering what the heck is that . i look at it for about 5 to 10 seconds and it takes off as fast as the speed of light. it was like a boomerang shape,it was very fast and was a grey color. i was stunned of what i saw. i know my dad believes in ufo's and i was skeptic about them and after i saw it i thought he wasn't that crazy,i couldn't believe it. after that i looked back at the pictures i had took and see that i have gotten a picture of it. and so i send it to my dad and go running to him and told him what i had seen.
content.summary: My daughter was taking pictures of the snow from the winter storm when she saw the ufo and took a picture before it flew off very fast

content.detailedDescription: While camping in kimberly, or at appx 10:00pm, myself and two others saw a disk shaped cloud hovering over our campsite.  it was almost transparent.  we could see through it.  the sky was clear that night and the stars were out.  it was silent.  we all looked at it for appx 10 min when it began do move west and it was gone.  we all had never seen anything like it in the sky.  it almost seemed to be watching us. it did not return.
content.summary: Disk cloud looking object hovering over our camp site

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst waiting for car to be serviced i was looking at the sky as it was a bright day. i saw an aircraft that took off from gatwick airport in sussex.
as i was looking at the airplane i thought i saw a plastic carrying bag floating along in the sky. however it was slowly turning and i noticed the trangle at the top followed by a reflection of the bottom triangle. it drifted along slowly rotating then turned into the clouds and was gone. from you tube it looked like an arcturian craft.
my location was the portslade basin on the coast road.
content.summary: Arcturian craft pyramid back to back.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to old ufo sighting just to see if i could communicate back, i did that on march 13, on my motorcycle and then came back home.   that i got my laundry together and call my mom to bring laundry back to her house, and as i was stepping out my front door looking west,, i looked up and saw an arrow drawn in the clouds!!  the error that was drawn the clouds was pointing north so i looked a little more further north from where the arrow is pointing and i saw a white.Object in the sky heading north that drop-down real quickly and sharply to her northwest direction and then disappeared within three seconds. that was the sign back i was looking for!!!
this took place in brevard county, both my first and fourth your flow that i've seen were over the port st. john river do you have seen for ufos so far in my life i feel that i've also had contact once but no one will ever believe me so i can only sit here and tell you what i've been through!!
content.summary: Drove vehicle back to 1st ufo sighting area,went home, leave, look up, arrow drawn in cloud pointing north, ufo moving north drops  nw disappears

content.detailedDescription: While staying in nigeria for business during the winter of 2009-2010, i was standing in front of a building on ogundana street in ikeja, lagos. this was in january 2010, but i cannot remember the exact date. it was around 11.00 in the morning. it was partly clouded, no rain. there seemed to be clouds on different levels. when i looked up into a northwestern direction (for no particular reason; i was just looking around a bit), i saw what seemed like a spherical object in the sky, which appeared to be stationary between the different layers of clouds. i could see the clouds under it and the clouds above it (or behind it) move by the wind, but this object remained absolutely stationary. it did not move an inch. at some moments, my view was blocked by the lower clouds for short moments, but when those clouds had passed, the object was still at exactly the same position in the sky. at first i thought it could perhaps be a hot air balloon, but that would have moved along with the wind. besides, the location is very close to the international airport of lagos and the object was very close or perhaps even right in the approach route of aircraft landing at that airport. considering the nearby clouds, i guessed that the object was about as big as or indeed larger than a hot air balloon. also, unlike a hot air balloon, it was perfectly spherical, whereas a balloon would be a bit tapered downwards. this object was as round as a perfect ball or orb. its colour was evenly dark brown, but it had a number of black rectangular spots on its surface. these were of different sizes and were positioned on various levels on the surface, but all in an even horizontal pattern, like the windows at different storeys of a building. however, they did not really look like windows, but rather like pure black surface areas. the edges of these areas were sharply defined, as was the entire object in the sky as well. the whole thing was very clearly and sharply visible in broad daylight. judging by the clouds, i would say it was about a mile away from me, while i was looking at it at an angle of about 45 degrees from where i was standing, but it could have been further away, depending on the distance of the clouds above or behind it. the object was not turning or moving in any way. it was just there, perfectly still and perfectly stationary. nothing was sticking out of it. it did not emit anything. it did not make any sound, at least nothing that would be audible above normal street noise. local people who saw it as well told me they had never seen it before. after i had observed it like this for about 20 minutes, a small cloud passed in front of it, as many other small clouds had done before, but this time the object was simply gone when the cloud had passed. however, i had not seen it coming from behind the clouds or moving away in any other way. it had just disappeaered. even though i have checked the sky many times after this event, i have never seen it again. i have tried to report it locally, but nobody seemed to be interested. when i recently heard about mufon, i decided to report it here.
content.summary: Large sphere between clouds.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out on our front porch using my brother's telescope to look at the moon. i had my camera and tripod set up. we noticed a bright chevron shaped object in the sky. it was brighter than any other stars and seemed to be moving slowly from ne to sw. i assumed that it was just an airplane until it changed shape to a u. i took a photo of the object right before it changed shape and then after it changed. then i took photographs of the different sections of the night sky, at about 70-80 degrees to the se, sw, w, nw, and ne. later when i uploaded the photos to my computer started looking through them expecting to see some fuzzy star patterns i found the other dark objects in the sky. some of the shapes were orbs, some had a resemblance to the space shuttle only black or at least not fully lit up, of the other two types one was a squatter angular version of the shuttle and the others were cigar shaped. the shuttles seemed to be in a formation, the cigar shapes and orbs were in looser formations across the sky. we routinely go out and watch the iss pass over head when it is scheduled to pass by at a reasonable hour so we are familiar with what that looks like and it passes much faster than the object was moving that night. i uploaded some of the photos to my facebook page to see if anyone saw what my wife and i did in the photos. i have photographed the same sections of the night sky periodically since that night but have not since captured any unusual objects in the sky. i checked my lens for dust etc to insure that it didn't produce the images but the lens was clean and a picture through a dirty lens would have produced the same object in all sections of the sky photographed. i don't know what the objects were, only what they appeared to be.
content.summary: Photographing night sky, observed bright chevron shaped object moving across sky, changed shape to a u .  uploaded pics, found many objects in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Was on my way to work and driving on interstate 55 heading south around springfield illinois the sun was coming up from the east it was around 6:45am and south of me it was getting ready for bad weather it was black and lightning . i noticed where the sun was coming up from the east and where the storm was to the south that there was a straight line that divided  the sun coming up and the storm i thought that was cool so i picked my phone up to snap a picture of the line that divided the sun light and the storm and out of nowhere this long bright rod came shooting across the sky looked to be following the curve of the earth i instantly took my phone in front of me and was able to catch the object on my phone it was only a matter of seconds and it was gone .Believe it or not i guess i was lucky if you look at the bottom of the picture you will see where i also got a picture of one of the interstate signs in my picture showed my picture to a lot of people over the years half of everyone says i'm crazy you know what i tell them lol..Well you know we don't have to worry about aliens visiting us on the planet anymore. and they would say and why's that.. l then said i'm already here.Lol....Anyway i enjoy my picture and you tell me what you think..
content.summary: Looked like a long white pipe

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had a spectacular ufo sighting tonight.

we were all settled in for an episode of vice (hbo), when i heard a loud whoosh, but i thought it was part of the soundtrack of vice. my wife exclaimed, "what the hell was that?" so she's looking out the window behind the couch explaining to me that the sound was coming from outside. i followed her as she dashed out the front door.

i could still hear the trademark military jet-type whooshing sound in the distance. it's sort of an irregular pulsating whoosh that starts suddenly and ends as suddenly as it started, and then repeats that maybe five or six times afterwards, the sound fading off.

so we're standing out front looking at the cloudless sky, and i'm telling her "you know, sometimes when military jets are sent low over areas they don't usually don't fly over, it means there was a ufo spotted in the area."

and not 30 seconds later, out of my left eye i see a light-orange-yellow spherical-shaped light moving nne to ssw high in the ssw sky moving ssw through the constellation orion. about a second later, as i'm alerting my wife to what i'm seeing, a second light that looked just like the first light appeared about 3" at arm's length to the west, moving exactly parallel with the first light. a second later, the second light faded out, and the first light continued on with its ssw trajectory a couple more seconds and quickly faded out.

i've seen probably 100 meteors, including 2 fireballs, 6 or so comets, satellites. and i've seen some unidentified stuff, too. but this was by far my most spectacular and unusual sighting. i'm 58.

they moved slower than a meteor but much faster than any jet i've seen at that apparent distance. neither one left a trail. 

we both got the sense that the lights were at least 10,000 feet up. they certainly weren't real close.

i got a real good look at them. they weren't steady, like light bulbs. nor did they strobe. they were distinctly round, but diffuse, and they gave the appearance that they were moving behind a sheet of water, or slightly translucent film with an irregular surface. at the point of fade they were maybe 40% of the diameter of a full moon.

by far the most unusual "object" i've ever seen in the sky.

and i kinda-sorta predicted it. ;)
content.summary: Loud military jet precedes 2 fast-moving yellow-orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I am a retired police officer from elmsford ny now residing in fair play sc. while residing in ny, i observed the so-called hudson valley lights on two occasions but said and reported nothing only to find out later that what i saw was becoming a sort of ufo phenomenon along the hudson river valley. my failure to take action then is why i am sure to file this report now. on march 17, 2015, my daughter was attending a boys tennis match in liberty sc as one of the teams managers. she text me in the early evening and told me that the bus bringing the team back to west-oak hs, on westminster sc, would arrive at approximately 8pm. at 7:20pm i grabbed my 15 week old puppy, put her in the rear seat of my 2002 chevy malibu and departed for the hs, which of approximately 15 miles west of my residence. i exited my driveway, made a left on west pine grove road and then i right onto cain road, which is approximately 1/4 mile long east to west. when i got to thè stop sign at the intersection of cain road and dairy farm road, and while in the process of making a right hand turn onto dairy farm road, i observed, at a distance, in the sky, an object that i will describe as looking like four shiny black bowling balls, held tightly together by force or design and positioned at an approximate 20 degree slant to the right, hovering motionless in the sky. this particular evening was very different from the normal sunsets i am used to. the sun was setting unusually large and an extreme orange, glowing through an unusual cloud cover resulting in a beautiful sunset. the object startled me at first because it was so unnatural and out of place in the early dusk sky and i wasn't sure if i had actually witnessed it or not. after made my right turn onto dairy farm road i was going to try to find a spot along the road to stop and try to take a photo but i couldn't in a safe manner. periodically i would lose sight of the object in the tree line but it never moved or left. after traveling for aproxmately 4 minutes i arrived at the intersection of dairy farm road and sc59, preparing to cross north onto smith dairy road. i witnessed the black object, still in the sky to my left, now to have changed shape to a silver cylinder. the object remained in a stationary position, occasionally reflecting the soft orange gow of the large setting sun. aproxately 10 minutes later i arrived at the west-oak hs. the object was still in the same position and remained there while i walked my dog and waited for my daughters bus. at around 8:10pm, the sun was almost completely gone in the western sky and the now silver cylindrical object was fading and left behind what appeared to be a soft cloud of the same size and shape which soon dissipated. i would like to add, and it seems to be of importance that during my witnessing this event there was a lot of airplane activity in the sky above and around this object. i observed at least four ionized exhaust lines left by planes traveling horizontal just below this object and approximately four or five more traveling from the sky above the object and down at a very slight angle towards the earth. i apologize for the description i am providing, perhaps i can furnish a drawing of try event if you wish to have it. this whole event, from witnessing the object and jet planes and them watching the object change form and disappear took about 40 minutes.
content.summary: I first observed a black object made of up several shiny black spheres hovering in clouds. later it changed to a shiny silver cigar shape and reflected sunlight at sunset. just before dark it disappeared leaving a light cloud of the same shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Up in juniata county pennsylvania , there's is a little town called east waterford.
about 6 miles outside of town some friends of mine own a hunting camp, they call it the cheap hotel. 
i tend to visit the cheap hotel 2-3 times a year. 
last night i was looking through some digital photos from a few years ago i have stored on a removable hard disk. there was a series of photos where it was snowing and i was taking pictures of my jeep rubicon i had parked on the hill in front of the field. as i was snapping pictures of the jeep, i thought i would get a picture of it snowing across the valley. 
well, here it is about 4 years later and i stumble across this photo on my computer. i was stunned when i first set eyes on these beauties last evening! 
these two objects seem to be in camouflage, notice how the object on the right, in front of the treeline blends in perfectly with the snow on the hill behind it. its exactly the same color.
two diamond shaped ufo's at the cheap hotel!.. i cant believe it!
hopefully the photo gurus at mufon have a good look at it and let me know there findings!
i have submitted a copy of the raw photo for viewing.
photo taken with sony hdr-ux5 handycam.
content.summary: The two objects seem to be in camouflage

content.detailedDescription:
My wife to pictures of the sun rise.
the object was seen when we looked at the pictures.
it is seen above the third palm tree from the left.
the three pictures (6,7,8) were taken after each other with about 30 second intervals.
the fourth picture is a blow up of the object.
content.summary: Ufo showed up in picture

content.detailedDescription: We were playing on rollor blades outside then about 10 ufos (we think) went passed my friends house. we got it on video but it's a full and all it shows were lights in the sky. they were all in tight formation. too tight to be human.
content.summary: We were playing outside when about 10 ufos swept past our house

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 16 years old, my mother, sister and i drove from northern virginia to my grandparents house in hazard, ky.  after we arrived, we were sitting outside on some lawn chairs, in a field between houses in the holler.  i looked up and saw a large craft hovering above the treetops but was big enough to cover the sky above the trees.  the craft hovered and i turned to my uncle joe and looked alarmed.  he said "that's our resident alien" and laughed slightly.  i was frightened but looked around at the other people sitting near me and they seemed to not notice the craft.  i was puzzled by the fact that no one else seemed to be frightened or concerned.  
it seemed like only a few seconds had passed and when i looked up again, it was gone.  i thought it was there longer than i had realized because it had gotten darker than it was just seconds previously.
it seemed to be cloudy and the lights on the craft were muted pastel colors which were encircling the treetops. the craft seemed to be large enough to cover the entire sky with the lights around the edges. the lights were glowing with alternating intensity.
i have reported this to mufon previously and was asked to call the ky mufon coordinator but i lost the email with the number.
content.summary: Large hovering craft with pastel-colored lights cloudy pink, orange, yellow, peach

content.detailedDescription: 1. was laying in bed when i felt the house starting to shake. at first i thought it was an earthquake. a few seconds later this was followed by sounds similar to one would find on a video game as well as a bright intense light which penetrated my very thick curtains. almost simultaneously, as whatever this was was flying by i felt like my skin was being burned. lasted at most 2 minutes.
content.summary: Bright light intense heat

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our porch when we noticed and object flying towards the east and it had a green light with 2 red lights that would blink. my husband commented about how that's not a plane with those lights. it continues to fly east when it suddenly switched directions to the ne. there the object flew higher in the sky then stopped and flew more ne before descending into the tree lines and making a sharp left to fly north. i was only able to catch the descending before it hit the tree line on video on my phone.  i am a believer so it made me feel like i knew it was a ufo. i have seen what i believe was a ufo years ago and the strange sudden movements were the same. my husband and i were both pretty shocked seeing this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first my husband and i thought it was a plane but the light blinking pattern was different.It flew east, went ne, then higher into the air, then switched and came down then went towards the north. i personally believe it was a ufo because i have
